WorkItem.Summary: AutoCompleteBox always return the same selected item

Comments.Message:
The problem is into UpdateTextCompletion ,becouse it select always the first find with same text. 
I'm rosolved add new bool parametrs to UpdateTextCompletion ,then determinate that item is selected from DropDown list.

I still have the same Problem with the current WPF Toolkit. 
Is there any solution or a newer version of the control?
